members.name: allowed
members.doc: Pass `true` to offer product by subscription and as one-time purchase. Pass `false` to offer product as subscription only.

members.name: productId
members.doc: Product ID.

members.name: assignedSubscriptionOptions
members.doc: Ordered array of subscription options that will be assigned to the product. Pass an empty array to remove all subscription options from the product.

members.name: assignedSubscriptionOptions
members.doc: Ordered array of subscription options that will be assigned to the product. Pass an empty array to remove all subscription options from the product.

members.name: productId
members.doc: Product ID.

members.name: ids
members.doc: ids of subscription options which will be applied to original price

members.name: ids
members.doc: ids of subscription options which will be applied to original price

members.name: prices
members.doc:
Original prices to which subscription options discount will be applied.
Key is identifier unique per price that can be used to match calculated prices with original price

members.name: _id
members.doc: Calculation id (product id)

members.name: prices
members.doc:
Original prices to which subscription options discount will be applied.
Key is identifier unique per price that can be used to match calculated prices with original price

members.name: subscriptionOptionIds
members.doc: ids of subscription options which will be applied to original price.

members.name: items
members.doc: Original prices to be calculated for each corresponding product id with related subscription plan ids

members.name: calculatedPrices
members.doc:
Key is identifier unique per price that can be used to match calculated prices with original price
Value is response with calculated prices for each subscription option

members.name: _id
members.doc: Calculation id (product id)

members.name: calculatedPrices
members.doc:
Key is identifier unique per price that can be used to match calculated prices with original price
Value is response with calculated prices for each subscription option

members.name: calculatedPricesPerProduct
members.doc:
Key is identifier unique per price that can be used to match calculated prices with original price
Value is response with calculated prices for each subscription option for each product

members.name: limit
members.doc: Amount of items to load per page.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the display (relevant for all pages after the first).

members.name: items
members.doc: Amount of items to load per page.

members.name: offset

members.name: _id
members.doc: Subscription option ID (auto-generated upon subscription option creation).

members.name: description
members.doc: Subscription option description (optional).

members.name: discount
members.doc:
Discount info (optional).
For example, a $20 discount would be `value: 20`, `type: AMOUNT`.

members.name: subscriptionSettings
members.doc: Subscription charge times. For example, if `frequency: MONTH` and `billingCycles: 6`; payment will be made monthly for 6 months.

members.name: title
members.doc: Subscription option title.

members.doc: Discount info (optional).

members.name: hidden
members.doc: Whether the subscription option is hidden for the product (the default is false).

members.name: subscriptionSettings
members.doc: Subscription payment settings. For example, if `frequency: MONTH` and `billingCycles: 6`; payment will be made monthly for 6 months.

members.name: title
members.doc: Subscription option title.

members.name: currency
members.doc: Subscription option price currency

members.name: discountedPrice
members.doc: Price calculated after subscription option discount applied

members.name: formattedDiscountedPrice
members.doc: Price calculated after subscription option discount applied, formatted with the currency

members.name: _id
members.doc: Subscription option id

members.name: convertedPriceData
members.doc: Price data calculated for subscription option, converted to the currency requested in request header

members.name: priceData
members.doc: Price data calculated for subscription option

members.name: autoRenewal
members.doc: Whether subscription is renewed automatically at the end of each period.

members.name: billingCycles
members.doc: Number of billing cycles before subscription ends. Ignored if `autoRenewal: true`.

members.name: frequency
members.doc: Frequency of recurring payment.

members.doc: Subscription option ID (auto-generated upon subscription option creation).

Discount info (optional).
For example, a $20 discount would be `value: 20`, `type: AMOUNT`.

members.doc: Subscription charge times. For example, if `frequency: MONTH` and `billingCycles: 6`; payment will be made monthly for 6 months.
